name: The Smart Printproof
description:
You can use your mouse to move around the screen and the W,S,A,D keys to move around the space. 

Concept:
The Smart Printproof (TSP) is a virtual reality app aimed at graphic designers, printers and anyone who deals with designing and printing print materials. The idea of the app was generated from the problems I had with legibility and proofing print work before sending it for mass printing. Designers create different types of print work daily and after which send it off to printers which are then sent to the printers. To ensure the scalability of their designs and legibility of fonts and images, the designer would either have to print a copy themselves to test for these parameters or this would be done by the printers. Oftentimes printers would skip this proofing step if the body of the print is too large in size, by just ensuring that the design file’s elements match current industry standards. The process as a whole is time-consuming, prone to a margin of error which could risk the final print not meeting client expectations and also has a negative environmental impact.
